dcterms:creator: Jagdeep Bhatia
Holly Jackson

dcterms:description: Evogym is a python library that simulates 2D VSRs and is able to evaluate them, allowing for the construction of robot structures and control mechanisms.
dcterms:title: Evogym

dcterms:creator: Eric Medvet
Alberto Bartoli
Andrea De Lorenzo
Giulio Fidel
dcterms:description: VSRs are an aggregation of soft cubic blocks, voxels, that can vary their volume in response to a control signal, allowing for flexible robot design.
dcterms:title: VSR (Voxel-based Soft Robots)

dcterms:creator: K. O. Stanley
R. Miikkulainen
dcterms:description: NEAT is an algorithm for evolving neural networks through augmenting topologies, allowing for complex network structures to be developed over generations.
dcterms:title: NEAT (NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies)

dcterms:creator: Kenneth Stanley
David Dâ€™Ambrosio
Jason Gauci
dcterms:description: HyperNEAT is an extension of NEAT that produces neural networks from a CPPN, allowing for the evolution of large-scale neural networks.
dcterms:title: HyperNEAT

dcterms:creator: Sidney Pontes-Filho
Kathryn Walker
Elias Najarro
Stefano Nichele
Sebastian Risi
dcterms:description: NCA is a framework for co-evolving body and brain using a neural cellular automaton, allowing for the growth of robot bodies and their control.
dcterms:title: NCA (Neural Cellular Automaton)
